name: HTML and CSS
about: Web Development for absolute beginners.Learn HTML5 and CSS3 from scratch by building 20+ amazing real world projects.

name: JavaScript
about: The modern JavaScript course for everyone! Master JavaScript with projects, challenges and theory. Many courses in one!.

name: Angular
about: Use Angular, Angular Material, Angularfire (+ Firebase with Firestore) and NgRx to build a real Angular App.

name: React
about: Learn React from the ground up to make dynamic websites (includes Context, Hooks, Reducers, Routing, Auth, Databases).

name: PHP
about: Use REST APIs from PHP, and create your own RESTful API using plain PHP, with API key and JWT token authentication.

name: Python
about: The best way to learn Python online! Understand, practice, and master Python with real-world examples. Zero to advanced! .Learn how to use NumPy, Pandas, Seaborn , Matplotlib , Plotly , Scikit-Learn , Machine Learning, Tensorflow , and more!

name: Machine learning
about: Build Powerful Machine Learning Models w/Zero Coding! Master Google Vertex AI, Microsoft Azure ML Designer, & DataRobot

name: Artificial intelligence
about: Build Artificial Intelligence (AI) agents using Deep Reinforcement Learning and PyTorch: A2C, REINFORCE, DQN, etc.

name: Data Structures & Algorithms in Java
about: Get interview-ready with this course that has no prerequisites and is designed to make you an expert in solving easy to hard LeetCode problems with ease.

name: DevOps
about: Without a doubt, DevOps engineer is the most in-demand role in the current market, especially with an increased number of high paying remote opportunities.
